title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUC) Advanced Course, Thailand

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUC) Advanced Course, Thailand; This course supplements instruction provided during the SIU Basic Course and provides additional instruction on several aspects of conducting a judicial wire intercept investigation. These include undercover operations, advanced operational planning, tactical entries, confidential Source management, and money laundering

title.narrative: Special Investigation Unit (SIU) 2 Basic Course, Thailand

description.narrative: Special Investigation Unit (SIU) 2 Basic Course, Thailand; This is a five week course serves as the foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for newly assigned officers. It is based on the DEA Basic Agent training program and covers a wide range of topics in drug law enforcement.
